QuestData.Title: Fight, Kill, Salute!
QuestData.Description: The greatest gladiators on Draenor have fought for glory and honor inside the Coliseum. Will you become a legend like Kargath Bladefist or will you be nothing more than bone dust beneath the boots of a more savage gladiator? There is only one way to find out.$B$BYou must enter the competition and fight! The price of victory is 100 lives!$B$BI will admit you without cost once per day, but if you fail and wish to fight again you must pay the price of admission in blood and bone!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 100 Gladiators at the Coliseum in Highmaul.$B$BYou may access the Coliseum by talking to Kharg at Highmaul or Boneslag at your Gladiator's Sanctum.
